citeinfo.origin: Pennsylvania Department of Transportation, Bureau of Planning and Research, Cartographic Information Division
citeinfo.title: PennDOT - Pennsylvania County Boundaries

descript.abstract: County boundaries within Pennsylvania as delineated for the PennDOT Type 10 general highway map.
descript.purpose: Public information and support for transportation planning, design and development.
descript.supplinf: This data is intended for use at 1:24,000 or smaller scale.

The USER is granted permission to translate and add value to the FILES for the use of the FILES on its computer hardware; provided, however, that the USER annually notify the UNIVERSITY / COMMONWEALTH of any customizing or value-adding work done.

cntorgp.cntorg: Pennsylvania Department of Transportation, Bureau of Planning and Research, Geographic Information Division

idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows 2000 Version 5.0 (Build 2195) Service Pack 4; ESRI ArcCatalog 8.3.0.800

attracc.attraccr: Verified visually by comparison against source materials.

dataqual.complete: Contains all counties in the Commonwealth.

horizpa.horizpar: Digitized from sources conforming to National Mapping Accuracy Standards for 1:24,000 scale maps.

procstep.procdesc: Digitized from 7.5 minute USGS topographic quadrangles on stable mylar base. Converted to ESRI Shapefile format for distribution.

altsys.altenc: Explicit elevation coordinate included with horizontal coordinates

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: County Federal Information Processing Standard (FIPS) from National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST)
